flesh.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the soft part of the body of a person or animal that is between the skin and the bones
flesh.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a freshwater fish with firm white flesh
flesh.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the skin of the human body
flesh.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His flesh was red and covered in sores.
flesh.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: the soft part of a fruit or vegetable that can be eaten
flesh.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Cut the melon in half and scoop out the flesh.
